page.title: 14Carlisle Head Post Office
page.content: The Head Post Office is in Warwick Road, but most mail is now sorted at Junction Street, where the post-coded letters can be sorted mechanically at a rate of 16,000 per hour. Most of our survey area falls into the CA1 post- code district, but Scotby's code is CA4 (HPO's code: CA1 1AA !) There are 83 deliveries in the Carl- isle area, serviced by 360 postmen and 87 counter, administrative, and super- visory staff. 450,000 letters are delivered weekly, 75,000 daily. The busiest day in the HPO is Thursday (when retirement pensions are paid via books of dated coupons), the quietest Wednesday. First-class stamps cost 17p, second-class 13p..coming down to 12p later this year..perhaps to enc- ourage people to phone less and write more. {
